name: Protect your treasure
description:
PROTECT YOUR TREASURE is a couch, multiplayer, office, one button brawler for up to 5 players.

It currently works best in Chrome.

GAME OBJECTIVE
Destroy other character's treasure to kill them,  using the  weapons you can find inside the chests.

INPUTS
- Every character is controlled by one button.
- Press your button to make your character jump.
- Press it again while mid-air to change direction.
- Keep it pressed and release it to use all the weapons you got, at once!

CREDITS
Characters: http://luciabellunato.com/
